protocol_name: Protocol for use with NEBNext rRNA Depletion Kit (Human/Mouse/Rat) E6310 (E7760)
protocol_name_html: Protocol for use with NEBNext rRNA Depletion Kit (Human/Mouse/Rat) E6310 (E7760)
description: The NEBNext rRNA Depletion Kit (Human/Mouse/Rat) depletes both cytoplasmic (5S rRNA, 5.8S rRNA, 18S rRNA and 28S rRNA) and mitochodrial ribosomal RNA (12S rRNA and 16S rRNA) from human, mouse and rat total RNA preparations. This product is suitable for both intact and degraded RNA (e.g. FFPE RNA). The resulting rRNA-depleted RNA is suitable for RNA-Seq, random-primed cDNA synthesis, or other downstream RNA analysis applications.
